page.title: 20YOUTHCLUB AND PLAYGROUP
page.content: A{playgroup}was formed in 1983 and caters for the 9 pre-school age children. It meets once a week.The group is affiliated to the{Pre-school {Playgroup Association}which provides guidance,valuable information and a News sheet.Children between 2 and 4 years are charged 50p per session which includes the 1/3 pint milk- allowance financed by the{Department {of Health and Social Security. The{Youth Club}caters for children from 8 to 18 years and meets in the Methodist chapel room twice a week. Membership is 50p, and 20p is charged for each session.Outdoor activites include rounders,cricket,swimming and horse-riding.Organised adventure outings are arranged to places of interest.A shield is given to the person contributing most to the club each year.
